verses.verse: By <S%H3915>night<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H4904>bed<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves:<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, but I <S%H4672>found<s%> him not.

I will <S%H6965>rise<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> and <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H7784>streets,<s%> and in the <S%H7339>broad<s%> <S%H7339>ways<s%> I will <S%H1245>seek<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves:<s%> I <S%H1245>sought<s%> him, but I <S%H4672>found<s%> him not.

The <S%H8104>watchmen<s%> that <S%H5437>go<s%> <S%H5437>about<s%> the <S%H5892>city<s%> <S%H4672>found<s%> me: to whom I said, <S%H7200>Saw<s%> you him <S%H853>whom<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves?<s%>

It was but a <S%H4592>little<s%> that I <S%H5674>passed<s%> from them, but I <S%H4672>found<s%> him whom my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves:<s%> I <S%H270>held<s%> him, and would not let him <S%H7503>go,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> I had <S%H935>brought<s%> him <S%H413>into<s%> my <S%H517>mother's<s%> <S%H1004>house,<s%> and <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H2315>chamber<s%> of her that <S%H2029>conceived<s%> me.

I <S%H7650>charge<s%> you, O you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> by the <S%H6643>roes,<s%> and by the <S%H355>hinds<s%> of the <S%H7704>field,<s%> that you <S%H5782>stir<s%> not up, <S%H518>nor<s%> <S%H5782>awake<s%> my <S%H160>love,<s%> <S%H5704>till<s%> he <S%H2654>please.<s%>

<S%H4310>Who<s%> is <S%H2063>this<s%> that <S%H5927>comes<s%> out of the <S%H4057>wilderness<s%> like <S%H8490>pillars<s%> of <S%H6227>smoke,<s%> <S%H6999>perfumed<s%> with <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> and <S%H3828>frankincense,<s%> with <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H81>powders<s%> of the <S%H7402>merchant?<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold<s%> his <S%H4296>bed,<s%> which is <S%H8010>Solomon's;<s%> three <S%H7657>score<s%> <S%H1368>valiant<s%> men are <S%H5439>about<s%> it, of the <S%H1368>valiant<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

They <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H270>hold<s%> <S%H2719>swords,<s%> being <S%H3925>expert<s%> in <S%H4421>war:<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> has his <S%H2719>sword<s%> on his <S%H3409>thigh<s%> because of <S%H6343>fear<s%> in the <S%H3915>night.<s%>

He <S%H6213>made<s%> the <S%H5982>pillars<s%> thereof of <S%H3701>silver,<s%> the <S%H7507>bottom<s%> thereof of <S%H2091>gold,<s%> the <S%H4817>covering<s%> of it of <S%H713>purple,<s%> the <S%H8432>middle<s%> thereof being <S%H7528>paved<s%> with <S%H160>love,<s%> for the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

<S%H3318>Go<s%> <S%H3318>forth,<s%> O you <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H6726>Zion,<s%> and <S%H7200>behold<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H8010>Solomon<s%> with the <S%H5850>crown<s%> with which his <S%H517>mother<s%> <S%H5849>crowned<s%> him in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of his <S%H2861>espousals,<s%> and in the <S%H3117>day<s%> of the <S%H8057>gladness<s%> of his <S%H3820>heart.<s%>
